body.raw:
{
    "@id": "asset-example",
    "@type": "dcat:Dataset",
    "dcat:distribution": [
        {
            "@type": "dcat:Distribution",
            "dct:format": {"@id": "HttpData"},
            "dcat:accessURL": "https://api.ebird.org/v2/ref/hotspot/ES-CM-AB",
            "proxyPath": "true",
            "authKey": "x-ebirdapitoken",
            "authCode": "otpbcu933m6f",
            "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
                "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
                "cbm:hasField": [
                            {
                                "@type": "cbm:Field",
                                "schema:name": "locationId",
                                "dct:description": "Unique identifier for the location",
                                "dct:title": "locationId",
                                "cbm:sampleValue": "L2521366",
                                "cbm:datatype": "string"
                            },
                            {
                                "@type": "cbm:Field",
                                "schema:name": "countryCode",
                                "dct:description": "ISO country code",
                                "dct:title": "countryCode",
                                "cbm:sampleValue": "ES",
                                "cbm:datatype": "string"
                            }]
            }
        }
    ],
    "cbm:hasSample": "sample-asset-hotspots-in-albacete",
    "dct:title": "hotspots-in-albacete",
    "dct:description": "desc",
    "edc:contenttype": "application/json",
    "dct:modified": "2025-12-11T09:50:25Z",
    "dct:issued": "2025-12-11T09:50:25Z",
    "dct:type": "Dataset",
    "dct:accrualPeriodicity": "never",
    "dct:accessRights": "https://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/1.0/",
    "@context": {
        "schema": "https://schema.org/",
        "cbm": "https://w3id.org/cbm/v0.0.1/ns/",
        "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
        "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
        "odrl": "http://www.w3.org/ns/odrl/2/",
        "dspace": "https://w3id.org/dspace/v0.8/",
        "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/",
        "edc": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/"
    }
}

{
    "@id": "sample-asset-hotspots-in-bizkaia-2",
    "@type": "Asset",
    "properties": {
        "cbm:isSampleOf": "asset-hotspots-in-bizkaia",
        "dct:issued": "2025-12-11T09:50:29+00:00",
        "dct:type": "Dataset",
        "dct:modified": "2025-12-11T09:50:29+00:00",
        "cbm:hasDataDictionary": {
            "@type": "cbm:DataDictionary",
            "cbm:hasField": [
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "locationId",
                    "dct:description": "Unique identifier for the location",
                    "dct:title": "locationId",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "L2521366",
                    "cbm:datatype": "string"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "countryCode",
                    "dct:description": "ISO country code",
                    "dct:title": "countryCode",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "ES",
                    "cbm:datatype": "string"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "subnational1Code",
                    "dct:description": "First level subnational administrative division code",
                    "dct:title": "subnational1Code",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "ES-PV",
                    "cbm:datatype": "string"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "subnational2Code",
                    "dct:description": "Second level subnational administrative division code",
                    "dct:title": "subnational2Code",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "ES-PV-GP",
                    "cbm:datatype": "string"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "latitude",
                    "dct:description": "Geographical latitude of the location",
                    "dct:title": "latitude",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "43.2809",
                    "cbm:datatype": "number"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "longitude",
                    "dct:description": "Geographical longitude of the location",
                    "dct:title": "longitude",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "-1.78801",
                    "cbm:datatype": "number"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "locationName",
                    "dct:description": "Name of the location",
                    "dct:title": "locationName",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "Aiako Harria PNat--Aiako Harriak",
                    "cbm:datatype": "string"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "observationDateTime",
                    "dct:description": "Date and time of the observation",
                    "dct:title": "observationDateTime",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "2025-05-18 10:30",
                    "cbm:datatype": "string"
                },
                {
                    "@type": "cbm:Field",
                    "schema:name": "numSpeciesObserved",
                    "dct:description": "Number of species observed at the location",
                    "dct:title": "numSpeciesObserved",
                    "cbm:sampleValue": "131",
                    "cbm:datatype": "number"
                }
            ]
        },
        "dct:title": "hotspots-in-bizkaia",
        "dct:accessRights": "https://opendatacommons.org/licenses/odbl/1.0/",
        "dct:description": "Get a list of hotspots in Bizkaia",
        "contenttype": "application/json",
        "schema:algorithm": "clustering"
    },
    "dataAddress": {
        "@type": "DataAddress",
        "proxyPath": "true",
        "type": "HttpData",
        "authCode": "APIKEY-PROVIDER-EBIRD",
        "authKey": "x-api-key",
        "baseUrl": "http://samples-server:80/samples/sample-asset-hotspots-in-bizkaia.csv"
    },
    "@context": {
        "schema": "https://schema.org/",
        "cbm": "https://w3id.org/cbm/v0.0.1/ns/",
        "dct": "http://purl.org/dc/terms/",
        "dcat": "http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#",
        "@vocab": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/",
        "edc": "https://w3id.org/edc/v0.0.1/ns/",
        "odrl": "http://www.w3.org/ns/odrl/2/"
    }
}
